subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Kirani James of Grenada edged the American LaShawn Merritt in a photo finish to win the men’s 400 meters at the 40th annual Prefontaine Classic in Eugene, Ore.
snippet: Kirani James of Grenada edged the American LaShawn Merritt in a photo finish to win the men’s 400 meters at the 40th annual Prefontaine Classic in Eugene, Ore.
